statements: SELECT * FROM production_line_processes;
SELECT process_name, start_time, efficiency FROM production_line_processes WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM production_line_processes ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT process_name, end_time FROM production_line_processes WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(efficiency) AS average_efficiency FROM production_line_processes;
SELECT * FROM production_line_processes WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT process_name, start_time, end_time FROM production_line_processes WHERE efficiency <= 0.5 ORDER BY efficiency ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT process_id, process_name, efficiency FROM production_line_processes WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY process_id;
SELECT * FROM production_line_processes WHERE efficiency BETWEEN 0.6 AND 0.8 ORDER BY start_time DESC, end_time ASC;
SELECT process_id, process_name, efficiency FROM production_line_processes WHERE start_time < '2022-06-30' AND end_time IS NULL ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineProcesses;
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM ProductionLineProcesses WHERE process_id = 100;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM ProductionLineProcesses WHERE process_name LIKE '%assembly%';
SELECT process_id, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionLineProcesses ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT efficiency_id, process_id, efficiency_rating, efficiency_date FROM ProductionEfficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5;
SELECT efficiency_id, process_id, efficiency_rating, efficiency_date FROM ProductionEfficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY efficiency_date DESC
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM ProductionLineProcesses WHERE process_id = 3
SELECT process_id, COUNT(*) AS total_efficiencies FROM ProductionEfficiency GROUP BY process_id
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineProcesses JOIN ProductionEfficiency ON ProductionLineProcesses.process_id = ProductionEfficiency.process_id WHERE ProductionEfficiency.efficiency_rating < 3.0
SELECT process_id, AVG(efficiency_rating) AS avg_rating FROM ProductionEfficiency GROUP BY process_id HAVING avg_rating > 3.5
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT process_name, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionLineProcesses WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 10;
SELECT efficiency_id, efficiency_percentage FROM ProductionEfficiency WHERE efficiency_percentage > 90;
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineProcesses;
SELECT process_name, start_time FROM ProductionLineProcesses ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT efficiency_percentage FROM ProductionEfficiency WHERE efficiency_percentage > 80;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT process_name, efficiency_percentage FROM ProductionLineProcesses JOIN ProductionEfficiency ON ProductionLineProcesses.process_id = ProductionEfficiency.process_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductionLine;
SELECT line_id, line_name FROM ProductionLine WHERE line_capacity > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM Product WHERE unit_price < 50.00;
SELECT status_name, status_description FROM ProductionStatus WHERE status_id = 3;
SELECT record_id, product_id, line_id, production_date FROM ProductionRecord ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionLine;
SELECT line_name, line_capacity FROM ProductionLine ORDER BY line_capacity DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Product WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM ProductionRecord WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT pr.product_id, pr.produced_quantity, ps.status_name FROM ProductionRecord pr JOIN ProductionStatus ps ON pr.status_id = ps.status_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineProcesses;
SELECT process_id, process_name, status FROM ProductionLineProcesses ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionEfficiency WHERE efficiency_percentage > 90;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM Tasks WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM ProductionLineProcesses WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT process_name, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionLineProcesses ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Production';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT p.process_name, e.employee_name, ta.assigned_date FROM ProductionLineProcesses p JOIN TaskAssignments ta ON p.process_id = ta.task_id JOIN Employees e ON e.employee_id = ta.employee_id;
